name: OutBreak: Corona Edition Amardeep Seeboruth
description:
Instructions:

Movement: 

A - Left

D - Right

W - Forward

S - Backward

F - Interaction

Space - Jump

Walk-through:

Player must work their way up to the second floor to acquire the cure.

1. Find the crowbar to access the office.

2. Find the Key in the office to open the kitchen back door.

3. Dodge the falling ceilings, and reach the computer to turn on the elevator.

4. Find the Brick in order to smash the Labs window.

5. Collect the Cure and make your way outside.

Tips:

Some lights will guide the way.
